IllegalBlockSizeException().Description: Constructs an IllegalBlockSizeException with no detail message. A detail message is a String that describes this particular exception.

IllegalBlockSizeException(java.lang.Stri.Description: Constructs an IllegalBlockSizeException with the specified detail message.

ClassDesc: This exception is thrown when the length of data provided to a block cipher is incorrect, i.e., does not match the block size of the cipher.
